definitions.title: 1. n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: city of Judah [[גְּדוֹר]] Jos 15:58; also as n.pr.m., under fig. of genealogy [[גְּדׂר]] son of Penuel 1Ch 4:4, [[גְּדוֹר]] son of Yered 1Ch 4:18; also [[הַגְּדוֹר]] 1Ch 12:7 v. d. H.; [[הַגְּדוּד]] Baer, cf. his note.

definitions.title: 2. n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: [[גְּדׂר]] 1Ch 4:39, but read Gerar, acc. to LXX Ew Hi Be al.
